name: Leman Demo
detailed_description:
This is a demo of Leman.

You will be able to play the tutorial, and the first ten days of a full campaign. You will be able to continue your game when you buy the full product.
about_the_game:
This is a demo of Leman.

You will be able to play the tutorial, and the first ten days of a full campaign. You will be able to continue your game when you buy the full product.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
